ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set identifies the laboratory test creatinine.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify the laboratory test creatinine. Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element would map to the Laboratory Test category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Include LOINC Creatinine lab tests using the source of blood, serum or plasma with a reporting scale of mass per volume.),(Exclusion Criteria: Exclude codes that do not meet the inclusion criteria.)
